meanings.definition: The act of apportioning or distributing something.
meanings.sent1: The apportionments of candies among the children were done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The apportionments of tasks in the group project were fair.
meanings.sent3: The apportionments of pizza slices caused a playful argument among friends.
meanings.sent4: The apportionments of sunlight in the garden made the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The apportionments of toys at the daycare were organized to avoid conflicts.

meanings.definition: The distribution of something in a fair and proportional manner.
meanings.sent1: The apportionments of time for each activity were well-planned.
meanings.sent2: The apportionments of resources among the team members were equitable.
meanings.sent3: The apportionments of cookies at the party led to smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: The apportionments of colors in the painting created a harmonious composition.
meanings.sent5: The apportionments of seats in the auditorium ensured everyone had a good view.
